price: Unibuke (yewe Muhamadi) ubwo Aburahamu yavugaga ati “Nyagasani wanjye! Ha uyu mujyi (wa Maka) amahoro n’umutekano, unandinde njye n’abana banjye kuba twagaragira ibigirwamana.”
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدَ ءَامِنٗا وَٱجۡنُبۡنِي وَبَنِيَّ أَن نَّعۡبُدَ ٱلۡأَصۡنَامَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qāla ib'rāhīmu rabbi ij'ʿal hādhā al-balada āminan wa-uj'nub'nī wabaniyya an naʿbuda al-aṣnāma
